coreAttributes.clothingAuthorTag: Small engraved lettering informs you that these piercings were made by 'TropicanSnow'.
coreAttributes.name: genital ring
coreAttributes.description: A metal ring closed with a captive ball, to be worn on the clitorial hood or outer labia in the style of a 'Diana' vaginal piercing.

replacementText.self: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(slide)] the ringed barbell into [npc.her] vaginal piercing.
replacementText.other: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(slide)] the ringed barbell into [npc2.namePos] vaginal piercing.
replacementText.otherRough: [npc.Name] roughly [npc.verb(slide)] the ringed barbell into [npc2.namePos] vaginal piercing.

displacementText.self: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(slide)] [npc.her] ringed barbell out of [npc.her] vaginal piercing.
displacementText.other: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(slide)] [npc2.namePos] ringed barbell out of [npc2.her] vaginal piercing.
displacementText.otherRough: [npc.Name] roughly [npc.verb(pull)] [npc2.namePos] ringed barbell out of [npc2.her] vaginal piercing.
